item.title: Securinets CTF Quals 2019 Special Revenge
item.author: bilalphilomath@gmail.com (philomath213)
item.description: Securinets CTF Quals 2019 - Special Revenge WriteUp Challenge details Event Challenge Category Points Solves Securinets CTF Quals 2019 Special Revenge PWN 1000 5 Description After the disappointment of last year challenge “special”, I came this year with a mystery revenge. ssh special@51.254.114.246 password : b8f07e1000c719c6a7febde4ec0ab24d Author : Anis_Boss Another jail escape challenge, we were provided with ssh login (username special).

item.title: Securinets CTF Quals 2019 Stone Mining
item.author: bilalphilomath@gmail.com (philomath213)
item.description: Securinets CTF Quals 2019 - Stone Mining WriteUp Challenge details Event Challenge Category Points Solves Securinets CTF Quals 2019 Stone Mining PWN 1000 4 Description I went inside a mine thinking it was safe, but got stuck. Help me out. Service is running at: nc 52.17.200.40 4000 Author: bibiwars A jail escape challenge this time, with no prompt, probably a shell jail.

item.title: SharifCTF8_ElGamat
item.author: bilalphilomath@gmail.com (philomath213)
item.description: Sharif CTF 8 - ElGamat WriteUp Challenge details Event Challenge Category Points Sharif CTF 8 ElGamat Crypto 200 Description ElGamal over Matrices: algebra-focused crypto challenge you can find full description in ElGamat.pdf Attachments Matrices.txt Solution This problem appears to be similar to the discrete logarithm problem (see Discrete logarithm), but instead of the generator g we a have a matrix \(G\), So we need to find \(x\) such that \(G^x = H\) (both \(G\) and \(H\) are \(5\times5\) Matrices).

item.title: About
item.author: bilalphilomath@gmail.com (philomath213)
item.description: philomath213: My name is Bilal Retiat, studing computer science at ESI-SBA, solving problems at HackerRank, doing challenges at Root-me. I skip school to participate in CTFs. Interests: Learning and Reading, CTF, Coding, Reverse Engineering, PWN, Crypto … You can check out my projects and writings in this blog. You can also find me on social networks and github (the links are in the button of the page)
